version_description: This update contains a bunch of small but mighty improvements across the app to make sure your experience is a smooth one!
This update contains a bunch of small but mighty improvements across the app to make sure your experience is a smooth one!
This update contains a bunch of small but mighty improvements across the app to make sure your experience is a smooth one!

New year, new features:

- Now, TAG a user in a post to automatically notify the user of your comment
- Reply to posts in just one tap and view replies with more ease thanks to a bunch of event feed enhancements
- Need to update your Registered Name? You can do that now in the app.

New year, new features:

- Now, TAG a user in a post to automatically notify the user of your comment
- Reply to posts in just one tap and view replies with more ease thanks to a bunch of event feed enhancements
- Need to update your Registered Name? You can do that now in the app.

- Now, TAG a user in a post to automatically notify the user of your comment
- Reply to posts in just one tap and view replies with more ease thanks to a bunch of event feed enhancements
- Need to update your Registered Name? You can do that now in the app.

- Fixed that crash that was happening for some of you when viewing invitations - it’s all better now!

- Reply to posts in just one tap and view replies with more ease thanks to a bunch of event feed enhancements
- Need to update your Registered Name? You can do that now in the app.

- Need to update your Registered Name? You can do that now in the app.

- Reply to posts in just one tap and view replies with more ease thanks to a bunch of event feed enhancements
- Need to update your Registered Name? You can do that now in the app.
Happy spring, party people! This update features a bunch of bug fixes as well as improvements to your push notifications, so that we’re always dropping you off right where you want to go in the app.
Happy spring, party people! This update features a bunch of bug fixes as well as improvements to your push notifications, so that we’re always dropping you off right where you want to go in the app.
Happy spring, party people! This update features a bunch of bug fixes as well as improvements to your push notifications, so that we’re always dropping you off right where you want to go in the app.

Got a party partner-in-crime? Update your app to accept an invitation to co-host an event! Co-hosts get access to manage invitations, meaning they can make event updates, add guests, receive notifications, and be seen as an event host by guests.

Stay tuned as we build out co-hosting features across desktop and mobile in coming releases.

Got a party partner-in-crime? Update your app to accept an invitation to co-host an event! Co-hosts get access to manage invitations, meaning they can make event updates, add guests, receive notifications, and be seen as an event host by guests.

Stay tuned as we build out co-hosting features across desktop and mobile in coming releases.

Got a party partner-in-crime? Update your app to accept an invitation to co-host an event! Co-hosts get access to manage invitations, meaning they can make event updates, add guests, receive notifications, and be seen as an event host by guests.

Stay tuned as we build out co-hosting features across desktop and mobile in coming releases.

We’re getting smoother and speedier by the update… Check it out:

- Made it easier for you to opt into push notifications, so you never miss an invitation, event update, or RSVP
- Cleaned up error messages throughout the app, so you always understand what’s happening
- Fail to load is no more! Added the ability to reload events on your Event List
- Fixed that issue where you were seeing duplicates in your Upcoming Events and Past Events (sorry about that!)

We’re getting smoother and speedier by the update… Check it out:

- Made it easier for you to opt into push notifications, so you never miss an invitation, event update, or RSVP
- Cleaned up error messages throughout the app, so you always understand what’s happening
- Fail to load is no more! Added the ability to reload events on your Event List
- Fixed that issue where you were seeing duplicates in your Upcoming Events and Past Events (sorry about that!)

We’re getting smoother and speedier by the update… Check it out:

- Made it easier for you to opt into push notifications, so you never miss an invitation, event update, or RSVP
- Cleaned up error messages throughout the app, so you always understand what’s happening
- Fail to load is no more! Added the ability to reload events on your Event List
- Fixed that issue where you were seeing duplicates in your Upcoming Events and Past Events (sorry about that!)

Party people, never miss a moment again.
- Manage your push notifications in Event Settings, under the More tab. Only want notifications for activity that involves you? Customize that there.
- RSVP’d “No” but don’t want to miss out? Now, you can receive notifications no matter your RSVP. Customize your settings on the RSVP screen or in Event Settings.

Party people, never miss a moment again! See all of your notifications in one place in your new notification center. Tap on any notification to go straight to the post.

We’ve got much love for your plus 1s. Now, add ’em directly to the invitation via desktop or mobile website.
- If you’re added to an event as a plus 1, you'll be able to join in and RSVP for yourself
- If your guests add plus 1s to your event, you can manage and view them on the Guest tab
- Everyone can see plus 1s on the guest list now, so you never have to wonder who you might run into

INTRODUCING INVITATIONS BY TEXT MESSAGE

Party people, the day has come. Today, we are excited to announce a huge release – invite guests by text message:

• Save time by selecting guests directly from your phone contacts (no more searching for email addresses!)
• Invite everyone - you can add guest phone numbers from any device
• Get your invitation seen sooner by grabbing their attention with a text
• Guests will receive a link to your Evite invitation right in their text messages

Update now to make sure they’ll be there.

Plus, this update includes support for iOS 11… so there’s that, too :)

It's aliiiiiiiive!

Today, we're thrilled to unveil EVITE MESSAGES.

Now, organize all your guest communication within the Evite platform, and keep a log of your conversation history. No more side texts or phone calls. Need a headcount for beef or chicken? Create a poll within your message threads for guests to vote. Need to nudge your guests to RSVP? Send a message out to all guests who have not yet replied. Need to remind someone to pick up ice on the way? Send a direct message to a specific guest.

Also, did you update to iOS 12? So did we.
"Hey Siri, what's my guest count?" Yeah, that's right. She'll answer you.

It's aliiiiiiiive!

In case you didn't hear, we have this new thing called Evite Messages, and we just made it even EASIER to communicate with everyone in the party right in the app.

Now, guests can message other guests, privately and in groups. Send messages to coordinate carpools, or a little surprise for the host!

FOR EVITE PRO SUBSCRIBERS: Good news! You can now track attendance on the day of your event by checking guests in at the door. Then, reach out to the right people after the event by grouping guests by attendance.
FOR EVERYONE: Accidentally canceled an event, or did it on purpose but changed your mind? You can now reinstate a canceled event and those precious RSVPs from before will still be there! Phew.

FOR EVITE PRO SUBSCRIBERS: Good news! You can now track attendance on the day of your event by checking guests in at the door. Then, reach out to the right people after the event by grouping guests by attendance.
FOR EVERYONE: Accidentally canceled an event, or did it on purpose but changed your mind? You can now reinstate a canceled event and those precious RSVPs from before will still be there! Phew.

FOR EVITE PRO SUBSCRIBERS: Good news! You can now track attendance on the day of your event by checking guests in at the door. Then, reach out to the right people after the event by grouping guests by attendance.
FOR EVERYONE: Accidentally canceled an event, or did it on purpose but changed your mind? You can now reinstate a canceled event and those precious RSVPs from before will still be there! Phew.

We still believe life is better together, even when apart.

We know you and your loved ones are seeking reasons and methods to safely connect. This release includes two big updates to help you gather virtually.

Video Chat: Add links to video chats directly in any of our invitations

Virtual Event Invitations: New designs, specifically made for your virtual gatherings

We know you and your loved ones are seeking reasons and methods to safely connect. This release includes two big updates to help you gather virtually.

Video Chat: Add links to video chats directly in any of our invitations

Virtual Event Invitations: New designs, specifically made for your virtual gatherings

Gathering virtually? Tap that update button to get these latest improvements:
- Confirm which invitations were delivered (and more importantly, undelivered)
- Edit and resend undelivered invitations
- Enjoy easier and prettier ways to manage your guest list (edit names, update RSVP statuses, etc.)

Hosting virtually? 
- We’ve added time zones to clear up any timing confusion for your guests on opposite coasts.
- Plus, we’ve added some neat little shortcuts, like the ability to jump straight from your email notifications to the app, so you can get the party started ASAP.

Another big one! This update introduces our brand new virtual party experience – better video quality, better connection, and overall way more fun than the one you’re currently using :) Update now to get these features and more for your next virtual hang:
- Emojis and chat
- No time limits
- Event reminders
- Join in one tap
- And lots more!
